item.title: Need help making server public may pay
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

any username, any password, and that specific IP some people have trouble first connecting but make sure you have hamachi on or the no-ip DUC running and that you have the port open.
That is extremely important- have the port open, you’ll have to look for a port forwarding tut since my router has its firewall disabled I never did it so I can’t help you with that matter.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making server public may pay
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

Step 1: Open up hamachi, if you dont have it download it at hamachi.cc. Open up your client and check on the top of the box for numbers this is your ip for people to go on you
server. it should look like this:

Step 2: Open up your server folder go into runserver open it up it should say starting whatever server on 0:0:0:0:43594 or 0:0:0:0:5555. those numbers at the end are your port and your server ip is the numbers from the top of hamachi.

Step 3: (Your last step!) advertise on server advertisement section

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making server public may pay
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

So to make it public what you will need is either no-ip or hamachi.
Then once you choose and set them up you read and find your IP from either no-ip or hamachi.
Make sure you have runserver on and tell ppl that IP from no-ip (host thingy) or hamachi (hover over network name)
